It can be used to calculate the velocity distribution within imported (or captured) images. It can also control OPTOLUTIONâ€™s lasers, cameras and synchronizers, and derive, display and export multiple parameters of the flow pattern. The simple graphical user interface makes PIV data acquisition and data post-processing fast and efficient.","gettingStartedGuideLabel":{"content":{"categoryID":"Deployment_Category_0124b3d0-6c1e-45b4-9f19-2f795b3d118c","labelID":"Deployment_GettingStartedGuideFile_0124b3d0-6c1e-45b4-9f19-2f795b3d118c"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ProjectLabel","uuid":"487d5dd8-4f26-4033-8f6a-30bbc943227a"},"maxRelease":"R2025a","minRelease":"R2019b","outputFileName":"PIVlab.mltbx","outputFolder":"Toolbox","summary":"Easy to use, GUI based tool to capture, analyze, validate, postprocess, visualize and simulate PIV data.\nhttp://PIVlab.de","supportedPlatforms":["Windows","Linux","Mac","MatlabOnline"],"toolboxFolder":"/","toolboxImgLabel":{"content":{"categoryID":"Deployment_Category_0124b3d0-6c1e-45b4-9f19-2f795b3d118c","labelID":"Deployment_ToolboxImageFile_0124b3d0-6c1e-45b4-9f19-2f795b3d118c"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ProjectLabel","uuid":"10807155-f770-4497-a8b0-f4c1f073ee09"},"toolboxName":"PIVlab","toolboxVersion":"3.10","uniqueId":"f7c33dd1-18cd-4708-a025-7ce388954b13"},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ToolboxConfiguration","uuid":"0e726d17-79fa-455d-a6b3-cc911f4f3202"},{"content":{},"type":"deployment.toolbox.model.ProjectStateValidationIssueList","uuid":"acb461d3-65f7-4129-b020-75fdada3bc67"}],"packageUris":["http://schema.mathworks.com/mf0/deployment_toolbox_model/1.0.0"],"version":"1.0"}
